description: This file defines the dashboard page for managing connections in a web application. It includes components for displaying connection details, status, validation, revoking actions, and fetching data via SWR hooks.

methods.name: StatusPill
methods.description: Displays a status indicator badge for connection state.

methods.name: ActionButtons
methods.description: Provides 'Validate' and 'Revoke' action buttons for a connection.

methods.name: ConnectorAvatar
methods.description: Displays an avatar or initials for the connector.

methods.name: ConnectionCard
methods.description: Renders a card for each connection, showing details and actions.
